0.user_question: Elise is learning to write and decides to keep re-writing the alphabet until she knows it. She writes it in full twice, writes half of it once, then re-writes everything she has already written. How many letters has Elise written in total?

ost_step.1: Elise wrote the entire alphabet twice.
ost_step.2: That's 26 letters for the first time (A to Z) and another 26 letters for the second time, making 52 letters.
ost_step.3: Elise also wrote half of the alphabet (13 letters).
ost_step.4: So she has written a total of 52 + 13 = 65 letters.

direct_answer.text: We can follow your hints: Elise wrote the entire alphabet twice, which makes 26 letters each time, so 26 * 2 = 52 letters in total. Elise also wrote half of the alphabet (13 letters), for a total of 52 + 13 = 65 letters written. The answer is: 65.
